projectGridLines.title: Project area  :   Data Science and Advanced Analytics
projectGridLines.description:
Project area : Data Science and Advanced Analytics

Expected learning (in bullet points)

At the completion of the internship, candidates would have the following learnings:

  1. Working knowledge of using data science and data analysis tools, such as SQL, Excel, Python, R
  2. Application of Data Science and Analytics in dynamic sectors such as Fintech, Insurtech, etc
  3. Client management and communication skills

Skill set required to execute the project (Technical)

Excel, SQL, Python/R (Extensive training will be provided onsite during the internship)
